allowClear.description: Support clearing, radio mode is effective
allowClear.description_zh: 支持清除, 单选模式有效

backfill.description: When using the keyboard to select options, backfill the selected items into the input box
backfill.description_zh: 使用键盘选择选项的时候把选中项回填到输入框中

defaultActiveFirstOption.description: Whether to highlight the first option by default.
defaultActiveFirstOption.description_zh: 是否默认高亮第一个选项。

defaultOpen.description: Whether to expand the drop-down menu by default
defaultOpen.description_zh: 是否默认展开下拉菜单

popupClassName.description_zh: 下拉菜单的 className 属性

:dropdownMatchSelectWidth.description: The drop-down menu is the same width as the selector. 'min-width' is set by default and is ignored when the value is less than the width of the selection box. false, which turns off virtual scrolling
:dropdownMatchSelectWidth.description_zh: 下拉菜单和选择器同宽。默认将设置 `min-width`，当值小于选择框宽度时会被忽略。false 时会关闭虚拟滚动

:filterOption.description: Whether to filter based on inputs. When it is a function, it will receive two parameters, 'inputValue' and 'option', and when 'option' meets the filter conditions, it should return 'true', otherwise it should return 'false'.
:filterOption.description_zh: 是否根据输入项进行筛选。当其为一个函数时，会接收 `inputValue` `option` 两个参数，当 `option` 符合筛选条件时，应返回 `true`，反之则返回 `false`。

open.description: Whether to expand the drop-down menu

:option.description: Through the option slot, customize the node
:option.description_zh: 通过 option 插槽，自定义节点

v-model:value.type: string | string[]|{ key: string, label: string | vNodes }|Array<{ key: string, label: string | vNodes }>

events.name: change
events.description: This function is called when option is selected, or when the value of input changes
events.description_zh: 选中 option，或 input 的 value 变化时，调用此函数

events.name: dropdownVisibleChange
events.description: Expand the callback for the drop-down menu

events.name: search
events.description: It is called when searching for a completion item
events.description_zh: 搜索补全项的时候调用

events.name: select
events.description: Called when selected, the parameter is the value value of the selected item
events.description_zh: 被选中时调用，参数为选中项的 value 值
